LanguageData.BM_SpacerCarrierUtilityModule.label: carrier module
LanguageData.BM_SpacerCarrierUtilityModule.descriptio: A high-tech device that can be installed into any compatible artificial leg replacement. This particular module is equipped with several storage compartments, automatic harnesses and special magnets that allow the user to carry more objects at the same time. It does not affect the amount of weight its host is capable of lifting.
